Title: Google Reveals Two New Web Crawlers
Description: Google has launched two new web crawlers: GoogleOther-Image & GoogleOther-Video.

Title: Why advertisers can no longer trust Google
Description: Article discusses the declining trust advertisers have in Google.

Title: EU asks Microsoft to provide information about Bing’s generative AI features
Description: The EU is requesting information from Microsoft about the risks of generative AI features in Bing.

Title: TikTok now testing 60-minute video uploads
Description: TikTok is currently testing the ability for users to upload videos up to 60 minutes long.

Title: Investment in martech companies down 87% vs. Q1 of 2023
Description: Investment in marketing technology companies has seen a significant drop compared to the first quarter of 2023.

Title: Microsoft faces EU pressure but avoids UK probe
Description: The EU is demanding information from Microsoft about Bing's generative AI, while the UK has chosen not to investigate its partnership with Mistral AI.

Title: How marketers are rolling out cookieless strategies in 2024
Description: Article explores how marketers are adapting to a cookieless future in their digital strategies.

Title: Remove Your Content From Google's AI Overviews
Description: Instructions on how to remove your content from Google's AI Overviews, a new feature in search results.

Title: EU warns Microsoft to give risk data on Bing AI or face fines
Description: The EU has threatened Microsoft with fines if they do not provide internal data on Bing's AI features and their potential risks related to elections.

Title: Google Ads AI Summaries Live For Some Advertisers
Description: Google Ads has launched a new AI-powered feature that summarizes campaign performance for some advertisers.

Title: Order with Google For Food Delivery Going Away End Of June
Description: The 'Order with Google' feature for food delivery services will be discontinued at the end of June.

Title: Google Locks Down Complaints Of Image Thumbnails Not Showing In Search
Description: Google has stopped responding to complaints on their support forums about ongoing issues with image thumbnails not appearing in search results.

Title: Mikhail Parakhin, Former Microsoft Bing Head, Joins Perplexity Advisor Board
Description: Mikhail Parakhin, former head of Bing Search at Microsoft, has joined the advisory board of Perplexity, an AI search startup.
